title: FluentAssertions.Dnx
summary: Fluent methods for asserting the result of TDD/BDD specs for .NET 4.0/4.5 (Desktop and Windows Store), SL5, WP8, WP8.1 and WPA8.1. Supports the unit test frameworks NUnit, XUnit, XUnit2, MBUnit, Gallio, MSpec, and NSpec.
description: A very extensive set of extension methods that allow you to more naturally specify the expected outcome of a TDD or BDD-style unit test. Runs on 4.0 and 4.5 (Desktop and Windows Store), Silverlight 5 and Windows Phone 8, 8.1 and 8.1 for Silverlight. Supports the unit test frameworks NUnit, XUnit, XUnit2, MBUnit, Gallio, MSpec, and NSpec.
